github_body:
General changes:
*  Increased performance of the website. I'll continue to monitor the performance as the amount of users & routes grow.

Map changes:
*  You can no longer attempt to assign raid markers while in view mode.
*  Raid markers can now be unassigned from enemies (in edit mode, of course).
discord_body:
v1.1.1 (2018/10/18)(https://keystone.guru/release/v1.1.1)
General changes:
    *  Increased performance of the website. I'll continue to monitor the performance as the amount of users & routes grow.

Map changes:
    *  You can no longer attempt to assign raid markers while in view mode.
    *  Raid markers can now be unassigned from enemies (in edit mode, of course).

changes.change: Increased performance of the website. I'll continue to monitor the performance as the amount of users & routes grow.
You can no longer attempt to assign raid markers while in view mode.
Raid markers can now be unassigned from enemies (in edit mode, of course).
